content:
Walter Tholen writes:

Dear Categorists,
At the upcoming 37th Summer Conference on Topology and its Applications
(17-21 July 2023, Youngstown OH),
https://ysu.edu/sumtopo
there will be a special session on Enriched Categories and Topology,
organized by Ulrich Hoehle, Dirk Hofmann, Isar Stubbe, and me.
The title of the session is to be interpreted in a very broad sense. If you
are interested in presenting at the session, please contact any of the
organizers at your earliest convenience.
Maria Manuel Clementino and Dirk Hofmann are invited speakers at the
conference.

Please note that the registration fees for the conference increase
beginning from June 6.

Walter
Sorry that I noticed this just now!
